headline: BD and ChemoGLO™ Collaborate to Expand Hazardous Drug Contamination Testing for Health Care Facilities and Laboratories
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, and ChemoGLO™, a specialist in hazardous drug detection and decontamination, today announced a strategic collaboration to advance hazardous drug contamination testing in health care settings to improve the safety of health care workers.
